div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 653 Kerassia, near anc. Aeneia, Mace- donia, 1959? Burial: after 76 B.C. (T) Contents: 48 AR Aesillas: 1 tetradr. Roman Rep.: 47 den. (to 76 B.C.) Disposition: Athens Varoucha, BCH 1960, pp. 494-5; A Delt 1961-2, Chronika, p. 5, illus.
